Package org.sakaiproject.site.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Group
    A Site Group is a way to divide up a Site into separate units, each with its own authorization group and descriptive information.
    Site
    Site is the object that knows the information, tools and layouts for a Sakai Site.
    SiteAdvisor
    A SiteAdvisor may be registered with the SiteService, and will be called immediately priory to a site being saved.
    SitePage
    A Site Page is grouping of tools in a Site.
    SiteService
    SiteService manages Sites.
    ToolConfiguration
    ToolConfiguration is a the placement of a tool on a site page; a placement with layout information.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SiteService.SelectionType
    SelectionType enumerates different supported types of selection criteria for getting / counting sites.
    SiteService.SortType
    SortType enumerates different supported types of site sorting.
